title: WTF I GOT CHAT RESTRICTED
body:
This community so soft skinned, these guy talk shit to me, I barely respond and get chat restricted ? All 3 game were yesterday so I remember clearly.

Get 10 game chat restriction because 1 DAY in SIX ****** YEAR SOME ******* MAKE ME TILT ?!?!?!

WTF riot. I've been with you since almost day 1, even day 1 with my second account, and that's what I get ? Been buying RP diligently to support your company even when league was nothing and I have ONE bad day & I get 10 games chat restriction ? OK.

Sure, 3rd game is slightly toxic, but at that point, all 9 other players were also talking shit on me, and 3 of them added me after the game and verbally abused me even, wtf is this? This is stupid.

Game 1
Ebay Account: ghost viktor
Ebay Account: grag go help riven plz
Ebay Account: she getting buttrekt
Ebay Account: can i take blue
Ebay Account: gragas ?
Ebay Account: ty
Ebay Account: u the real mvp
Ebay Account: he lag
Ebay Account: ah
Ebay Account: greedy
Ebay Account: my bad
Ebay Account: I tho I had yellow ward up
Ebay Account: u being a dick about my mistake is most likely why your silver
Ebay Account: i took the time to say sorry
Ebay Account: and you be a dick to me
Ebay Account: wtf
Ebay Account: u not diamond I
Ebay Account: idc
Ebay Account: what u say
Ebay Account: wtf
Ebay Account: gragas so mad
Ebay Account: than why u talk shit all game
Ebay Account: he didnt want to gank for riven
Ebay Account: when she was losing lane
Ebay Account: saying fuck her
Ebay Account: and he was a bitch about a mistake where I even said sorry about beforehand
Ebay Account: you never ganked mid either
Ebay Account: dude you ganked 0 times with gragas stop crying
Ebay Account: You ganked like ... twice bot ?
Ebay Account: 0 times mid
Ebay Account: 1 time top
Ebay Account: with a champion that is supposed to gank non stop
Ebay Account: and ? I was winning lane and he didn't gank for me either

Game 2
Ebay Account: dont worry malzahar op
Ebay Account: check my last 2 games :D
Ebay Account: lol no
Ebay Account: E + W
Ebay Account: win :D
Ebay Account: R bad
Ebay Account: can't do rotations with R
Ebay Account: J'viens de lui dire sur skype
Ebay Account: arrete de tilt
Ebay Account: kali say sorry she tilt like a pussy
Ebay Account: My reaction would've been for a youtube video
Ebay Account: My work
Ebay Account: called me
Ebay Account: fuck you
Ebay Account: this is what happen
Ebay Account: when i have 2 hands
Ebay Account: lata bitch
Ebay Account: lag
Ebay Account: lucky
Ebay Account: i lata you all game %%%got
Ebay Account: stfu
Ebay Account: you filthy plat V
Ebay Account: scum
Ebay Account: ez lata


Game 3
Ebay Account: why
Ebay Account: ping
Ebay Account: if you didnt want to commit ?
Ebay Account: you pinged
Ebay Account: to gank
Ebay Account: that mean ou're going in
Ebay Account: not be a coward in bush
Ebay Account: diamond IV
Ebay Account: losing to plat IV
Ebay Account: with yasuo
Ebay Account: so bad
Ebay Account: yasuo how you be diamond IV
Ebay Account: but i main ADC too
Ebay Account: u 1 divison above me
Ebay Account: u suppose to win
Ebay Account: yo
Ebay Account: u betray
Ebay Account: me
Ebay Account: 1v1
Ebay Account: how diamond lose to gold in lane
Ebay Account: explain to me plz
Ebay Account: Kass gold
Ebay Account: cass diamond
Ebay Account: I start playing malzahar today
Ebay Account: I go even vs diamond yasuo
Ebay Account: No excuse
Ebay Account: and
Ebay Account: bad team overextend
Ebay Account: what can i say ?
Ebay Account: you outrotate me but no excuse for my team to die under your towers
Ebay Account: see explain this, everyone miss everyyhing and they still commit
Ebay Account: they dont teach u how to back in platinum and diamond school;l
Ebay Account: How we losing to 60 cs vayne
Ebay Account: no
Ebay Account: stfu
Ebay Account: weaboo
Ebay Account: My poop team get outscaled*
Ebay Account: Malz scale into late game
Ebay Account: no
Ebay Account: im bronze
Ebay Account: thanks
Ebay Account: vayne
Ebay Account: for saving me
Ebay Account: Proof vayne is bad condemn me out of zyra ykt
Ebay Account: rush
Ebay Account: lee dead
Ebay Account: nvm
Ebay Account: warrior when behind
Ebay Account: smart choice
Ebay Account: he made me waste flash + ignite twice because he wouldnt commit to ganks
Ebay Account: he wasnt ahead
Ebay Account: WTF $REMREGNIHGMPTREONHWDM
Ebay Account: FUREGMBTARONWGHMA#%'EMTP$WJ RNOGMFV'
Ebay Account: NOOOOOOOB POOOPPROERKOGBMGFON TEAM
Ebay Account: RGMFOBNTMDFPBMTOGRF'C
Ebay Account: REPORT WHOLE TEAM UNSPORTMANLIKE
Ebay Account: KEEP TROWING
Ebay Account: WTF
Ebay Account: WHY U PLAY LEAGUE IF YOU DONT WANT TO WIN
Ebay Account: WTF FUCKING TROLL REMOWDEGNRFHDJGMB'FV
Ebay Account: This diamond cass is toxic
Ebay Account: FUCK YOU

replies.body:
First game: meh levels of salt/toxic at the end

2nd gamr: Toxic

3rd game: full tilt

> [{quoted}](name=Makior72,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=hegeIvYt,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-12-11T19:53:26.432+0000)
>
> First game: meh levels of salt/toxic at the end
> 
> 2nd gamr: Toxic
> 
> 3rd game: full tilt

Your silver rank after 300 games is also deserved.

> [{quoted}](name=Ebay Account,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=hegeIvYt,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-12-11T20:18:25.297+0000)
>
> Your silver rank after 300 games is also deserved.

Im not silver.

A for effort tho

> [{quoted}](name=Makior72,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=hegeIvYt,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-12-11T20:59:48.365+0000)
>
> Im not silver.
> 
> A for effort tho

600 games gold IV, same thing.

Game 1 is pretty meh. Not terrible, but you are letting other players pull you into their toxicity.
Game 2 is worse. For one thing, "Ebay Account: i lata you all game %%%got" is never okay. Using those sorts of slurs is a very fast way to get yourself punished, so best to get out of that habit.
Game 3 is bad. You're raging pretty hard, and from pretty early on in the game.

All together I'd say definitely worth a punishment.

It seems like your biggest issue is how you react to other toxicity in game. You stoop to their level and just contribute further to a negative experience for your allies. It makes you no better than them, and both of you deserve reports in that situation. "He started it" is not an excuse in League, and retaliation is not okay. This has been made very clear by Riot at this point. 

Instead of responding to these people (it's what many of them want), just mute them once they start raging or harassing people. Then you can report them after the game. They'll be the ones here complaining about punishments, and your account would still be in good standing.

> [{quoted}](name=Zielmann,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=hegeIvYt,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-12-11T19:59:52.599+0000)
>
> Game 1 is pretty meh. Not terrible, but you are letting other players pull you into their toxicity.
> Game 2 is worse. For one thing, "Ebay Account: i lata you all game %%%got" is never okay. Using those sorts of slurs is a very fast way to get yourself punished, so best to get out of that habit.
> Game 3 is bad. You're raging pretty hard, and from pretty early on in the game.
> 
> All together I'd say definitely worth a punishment.
> 
> It seems like your biggest issue is how you react to other toxicity in game. You stoop to their level and just contribute further to a negative experience for your allies. It makes you no better than them, and both of you deserve reports in that situation. "He started it" is not an excuse in League, and retaliation is not okay. This has been made very clear by Riot at this point. 
> 
> Instead of responding to these people (it's what many of them want), just mute them once they start raging or harassing people. Then you can report them after the game. They'll be the ones here complaining about punishments, and your account would still be in good standing.

If someone tell me latta %%%got, why can't I tell them the same thing ? Didn't they tell you ''Don't do to others what you don't want to be done to yourself'' ?

''Don't do to others what you don't want to be done to yourself'' is solid advice, but that doesn't mean it's your right or your responsibility to 'do unto them'. It's a guide for your own actions, not a justification for attacking others.
In situations like this, it's better to go by "be the bigger man".

You can't do that because retaliating means that there are two people behaving like mongoloids in the chat rather than just one. Retaliation is not acceptable, regardless of how justified you feel. Mute them and carry on playing your game.

> [{quoted}](name=IronwallJackson,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=hegeIvYt,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2015-12-11T20:24:59.154+0000)
>
> You can't do that because retaliating means that there are two people behaving like mongoloids in the chat rather than just one. Retaliation is not acceptable, regardless of how justified you feel. Mute them and carry on playing your game.

There was at least 4 in each game actually.

If I were you I wouldn't bring public attention to myself. If you act like this again a manual review might result in an instant ban.

I strongly suggest muting people that bother you, to prevent the urge to respond to them like this.
I was scrolling and was like "hmm there is nothing wrong", then caps lock started. U only got chat restrict for this ?

> [{quoted}](name=alasarcher,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=hegeIvYt,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-11T19:50:31.605+0000)
>
> I was scrolling and was like "hmm there is nothing wrong", then caps lock started. U only got chat restrict for this ?

All 9 other player where typing in caps lock ( and one of them was using a bot to repeat what i say, while 3 others where all verbal abusing me ).
Instead of coming here and complaining, learn from it. Don't get caps lock ragey at people. Just mute them. Trust me, 2 week suspensions suck...
deserved.

> [{quoted}](name=Orbitalightning,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=hegeIvYt,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-12-11T19:51:40.155+0000)

> deserved.

NOOOOOOOB POOOPPROERKOGBMGFON TEAM
WTF FUCKING TROLL REMOWDEGNRFHDJGMB'FV
FUREGMBTARONWGHMA#%'EMTP$WJ RNOGMFV'
WTF $REMREGNIHGMPTREONHWDM
This kid loves attention. Why hasn't he been forum banned yet? So childish and counterproductive.

> [{quoted}](name=Frig Off Lahey,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=hegeIvYt,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-12-11T20:44:45.982+0000)
>
> This kid loves attention. Why hasn't he been forum banned yet? So childish and counterproductive.

Why are you being toxic to me ? Player & behavior community obliterate this foolish scum who's being toxic to me on the forum plz.
Definition of hypocrite.
Keep it up and a 14-day ban is in your future. Hopefully the chat restriction helps though, at least you won't be able to continue to be toxic towards your team for a while.

> [{quoted}](name=Korillo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=hegeIvYt,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-12-11T20:39:01.698+0000)
>
> Keep it up and a 14-day ban is in your future. Hopefully the chat restriction helps though, at least you won't be able to continue to be toxic towards your team for a while.

You'd be surprised how toxic you can get with those 5 allowed messages. And I speak from experience.
the all caps in the third game most likely gave you the chat restriction
I could tell how this thread was going to go based on how you started your thread title with "WTF"
